Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert the into the .
Docs.summary: Inserts a into the at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the `index` parameter equals the number of items in the collection, then the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> is appended to the end of the collection.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
